awd_titl_txt: Data Base Inventory of Women's Participation in Scientific  Fields (SGER)
awd_abstract_narration: PI will study reports on women's participation in scientific                    fields, and develop a set of criteria for evaluating existing                   data bases on this topic.  Although the literature contains                     numerous reports on people involved in science, reports dealing                 specifically with women in these fields are scattered and vary                  widely in the purposes of the report, the samples included, data                reported, reliability of facts, and quality of inferences made                  from the data.  This project will assess the state of the litera-               ture, identifying ways to find existing data, and presenting ways               to determine quality and generality of information contained in                 them.  The outcome of this project will be a rating instrument                  usable by the PI and other investigators to judge the usefulness                of existing data bases on women in science.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences
